mapper.sql: id, name, code, component, pid, level_path, level, path, icon, type, sequence, status, hide_children, gmt_create, gmt_modified, creator, modifier
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, a.name as applicationName, p.code as permissionCode, p.id as permissionId FROM iam_menu r inner join iam_permission p on p.resource_id = r.id inner join iam_application a on a.id = r.application_id AND r.pid != 0 AND r.is_deleted = 0 AND p.type = 'FRONT_ROUTE'

SELECT r.*, a.name as applicationName, p.code as permissionCode, p.id as permissionId, rp.name as parentRouteName FROM iam_menu r inner join iam_permission p on p.resource_id = r.id inner join iam_application a on a.id = r.application_id left join iam_menu rp on rp.id = r.pid where r.is_deleted = 0 and r.id = #{id}
